title: Top Female Secondary School Enrollment
description: In 2017, Canada achieved a remarkable milestone with a 100% net enrollment rate for females in secondary education, showcasing its commitment to gender equality in education.

title: Comprehensive Universal Health Coverage
description: As of 2021, Canada boasts a UHC service coverage index of 91, reflecting its robust healthcare system that provides extensive services to its citizens.

title: Significant Portfolio Equity Outflows
description: In 2023, Canada experienced a net outflow of portfolio equity amounting to $35.8 billion, indicating challenges in attracting foreign investment.
